subject: Order Update Request – Express Shipping for Pedals Ordered on October 3rd
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I’m writing to inquire about the status of my recent order placed on October 3rd for a set of Simsonn Plus X pedals. I also paid an additional £20 for express shipping, but I haven’t yet received any updates regarding the delivery.

Could you please let me know when I can expect the order to arrive? If there are any issues or delays, I’d appreciate an update.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards, Cane

conversations.body_text: Hi Cane Martos,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959598114
ID 为 4613 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4613  
      主题: Order  
      描述:  
Hello, 
 
 
 
 
I recently ordered the Simsonn Plus X peddles and paid the extra £20 to receive the package with in 3 - 7 days. I ordered is on Friday the 3rd of October and have not heard back, the only thing I got was the confirmation email. If you need any more information,
 please email me back. Please let me know. Thank you
